resources.string: Faito te haapiiraa hau vaevae hou
Aro\'a\'a mai
Chats
Bot chats
My messages
Aita hia henua i nia haapiiraa\'a\'ai.
Înī ra i te haere i roto i te tārava i te taua manihini iā hia here.
Aita tenei iā te hōhā noa hia ana.
O te fàaitoitoi i te haá itetahi parau hou, e faanahoraa i nei.
Aore i te uira\'a
E faaito teie hana, hauhia ia noa!
Confirm
Aore!
Faahiahia i te pee.
I teie nei ra\'a
Auahi vahine.
Louise e te faahanahana parau sipeini e ti\'a here iā \'oe i te ho\'oheno i to\'ou aso fa\'aparau!
Gabriel, he French photographer, e haapiiraa i te faaroo i te haari i to oe parau!
Rakesh he Tamuli université tahitien e, poerava i te vahi ia i te faahiti\'hia no\'ou i to\'ou perepere\'ia!
Evelyn he play writer Britani no noa atu e te aida i te faaoraora atu i to oe maoio.
Ahsan he atiariiei ite hotuputupu rahiaraa parau no oe!
Min, he Paitini poropiti Saina e haapii i ta outou perorea!
